name: Saving Princess Sita
description:
Saving Princess Sita is a dungeon crawler set in the Ramayana universe where you move the legendary monkey army through the palaces of Lanka sabotaging the demon king Raavan’s army and avoiding drawing attention. You can’t control the monkey army directly and they are not the sharpest tool in the shed. Throw some bananas to help them navigate undetected through the demon king’s fortress.

We took the myth of the Monkey Army from Ramayana and made a game about how the great monkey god Hanuman and his army infiltrated Lanka, which was the base of operations for the demon king Ravana. 

How to Play-

  • Left Click anywhere on designated to throw Bananas to instruct directions to your monkeys. 
  • Your goal is to collect every letter from Princess Sita and break the arms and shrines around the room.
  • Avoid being spotted by the demons in the room, by guiding your monkeys and making them hide behind walls, tables, and barrels
